name: Space Collapse (Alourenco)
description:
A black hole is consuming the hole universe and your space ship! Avoid the planets and try to keep yourself as far as possible from the black hole. Carefull, fuil is not endless.

Game Developed by 3 guys:

  • André Lourenço
  • Bernardo Pinheiro
  • João Gonçalves

Third Party, Free Assets:

  • Music and Sound Effects;
  • Space Ship Mesh;
  • Fuel Can Mesh;
  • Planets Textures.
